item.title: The challenge of running lavalink
item.description: Hello ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m Darren! I am a sysadmin. Meaning I have a lot of servers that I rent for testing and development. I also have a discord music bot Model Buses that uses lavalink. Having one lavalink server isn’t enough…. jk it’s prob enough, but I like to have a few more for redundancy. As of writing this, my bot model buses are on 97 guilds, which isn’t that much.
